storage-client.cost-disclaimer: There is currently no charge for the use of Storage, however at an as of yet to be determined date in the future, there will be a cost and at that time you will have 90 days to decide if you wish to continue using Storage or not.

on-boarding.title: Support
on-boarding.lead: Subscribe to access telephone, email and remote control, diagnosis, and correction, for  Rise Vision Applications.
on-boarding.details-1: We provide Support from 8am to 5pm CST Monday through Friday, holidays excluded. It is currently {{currentTime}}.
on-boarding.details-2: You can expect to hear from us {{nextSupportDay}} at {{nextSupportTime}}.
